text:
Jagannath is most widely worshipped in his famous 'handless' form,
crafted by the 'divine sculptor of his homeland'.

There are many speculations and legends regarding the reason for this.
Some say it represents everything that he has lost.

At the words of others, they claim the following.
Jagannath, is actually 'complete in this very form'.

In other words, the true meaning is as followed. The hands Jagannath meant to hold,
are those 'provided by someone other than himself'.

name: Jagannath
text:
I think I've already told you once before, haven't I, [Player]?
About the Battle of Kurukshetra, and what I lost in its aftermath.

name: Jagannath
text:
I failed to save a single man. For the sake of the 'law' called Dharma,
I chose to lead my dear ally, Arjuna, into battle.

name: Jagannath
text:
I don't think my judgment at the time was wrong.
But that doesn't make the sacrifices we made any more right.

name: Jagannath
text:
I was the one who made the call that resulted in the greatest loss.
The 'Brahman Arrows' fired by both sides clashed in the sky, and then—

name: Jagannath
text:
My ally, and my immortal enemy, Ashwatthama...
Both of them, and the very earth itself, suffered wounds that will never heal.

name: Jagannath
text:
Failing to save him from his 'Adharma', letting him fall
to the 'dark side', all of it was all my fault to blame.

name: Jagannath
text:
These half-baked hands of mine.
They couldn't reach my enemies, nor my friends. They reached no one.

name: Jagannath
text:
Since then, I've been struggling and squirming,
becoming the kind of switch-puncher you see today.

name: Jagannath
text:
But even so, with just these two arms of mine...
There are some things that are simply beyond my reach.

name: Jagannath
text:
That's why I'm grateful to you, [Player].
...I wanted to make sure I told you that today.

When [Player] opened their eyes, Jagannath's face
was right there in front of them.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hm? What, you're awake?
We're not there yet, so you can keep sleeping.

After the Christmas festival, the two were being driven home in a police car.
Beside them, Jagannath was smiling gently.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm...? No, nothing at all?
Hehe, I did get to hear plenty of your cute sleep-talking though?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stuff like 'I love Jagannath-senpai' or
'I want Jagannath-senpai to pet me'...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, 'I definitely didn't say that'?
It sure sounded like it to my ears though?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Since you're awake now, mind if I take a turn?
Even someone like me gets tired.
He rested his head softly on [Player]'s shoulder, closed his eyes, and soon began to breathe steadily as he slept.

Between double-schooling and his fight club, it was always a mystery when Jagannath actually slept.
His expression was unusually defenseless.
But perhaps sensing a gaze, Jagannath snapped his eyes open and flashed a mischievous grin.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]... If you ever feel, even just a little bit, that being a cop isn't so bad, then I—
With those words left hanging like he was running away, he closed his eyes again and let out a quiet snore.

options.text: Sorry, I was leaning on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm? Oh, don't worry about it.
Your sleeping face was pretty cute, actually.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But you know, showing such a defenseless face next to a guy like me...
I might have to teach you exactly what kind of danger you're in?

Jagannath leaned his face in close.
Their shadows overlapped, and for a moment—

—Nothing happened.
Jagannath simply rested his head on [Player]'s shoulder and closed his eyes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm wiped out.
I'm gonna crash for a bit until we arrive.

Between double-schooling and his fight club, it was always a mystery when Jagannath actually slept.
The defenseless expression on his face was unusually rare.
But perhaps sensing a gaze, Jagannath snapped his eyes open and flashed a mischievous grin.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]... If you ever feel, even just a little bit, that being a cop isn't so bad, then I—
With those words left hanging like he was running away, he closed his eyes again and let out a quiet snore.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, what a cutie.
I'll wake you when we get there, so just sleep.
Jagannath pulled [Player] close in a firm embrace, gently patting their head while humming a soft lullaby.
Surrounded by a gentleness one would never expect from him, [Player] drifted back into a comfortable slumber.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]... If you ever feel, even just a little bit, that being a cop isn't so bad, then I—

text:
One month after coming to Kiou Police Academy, [Player]
was buried in paperwork in their role as a student.

options.text: Will he praise me if I finish this by myself?
Where the hell did that tiger go...!?

name: Police Academy Student
text:
[Player], has your senior already headed home?
I had a few questions regarding the previous incident.

The other senior officer spoke with an apologetic tone.
[Player] was already well-known as the 'Jagannath Handler' at the station.

options.text: Sorry, even I don't know where he went...
I have a good idea where he is.
Maybe I should plant a GPS in his neck next time.

text:
Yes, Jagannath had been leaving early quite often lately.
The place he headed to was—

name: Ring Announcer
text:
"In the Blue Corner! Will he tear through the house again tonight?
The Lightning Switch-Puncher, Jagannath!!"

Jagannath responded to the call with a fearless smile.
The crowd erupted as he performed a quick shadow-boxing display.

note: one of the rare times a mob's name goes untranslated

options.text: I'm reporting this delinquent cop right now...!

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
Hmph, I'll make you howl today. The fans have been waiting
to see your pathetic defeat for quite a while now.

name: Jagannath
text:
Don't talk about things you can't do, old man.
Besides, it looks like someone important came to watch today.

name: Jagannath
text:
Sorry, but I can't look like a loser in front of my Buddy.
I'm ending this in a heartbeat.

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
Ho...? I won't go easy on you! Give up and
get ready to crawl and whimper at my feet!

Both were already charged with fighting spirit.
The moment of truth finally arrived—

name: Jagannath
text:
Yo, Buddy. You actually came all the way to see me?
Well? Did you fall for my heroic figure all over again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, I know, right?
I'm a Buddy worth bragging about, huh?
Give me some more praise.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...God, you're hopeless.
I'll take the scolding for the both of us.

options.text: You've been slacking off for matches a lot lately.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, don't be like that. I was cool, wasn't I?
Admit it, you love it when I'm fighting like this.

text:
Jagannath smiled mischievously. He looked nothing like the
fierce, bloodthirsty beast he was during the match.

Inside the cage, Jagannath is known as the 'Black Tiger',
cornering opponents with precision punches—

The gap between his 'on' and 'off' personas was
one of the reasons for his immense popularity.

name: Jagannath
text:
I saw you cheering for me from the stands.
That made me a bit more fired up than usual, y'know?

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
Urgh... Gagh...! Dammit, this guy...
He's just messing with me...!

name: Jagannath
text:
What's wrong, old man? You're getting sluggish.
At this rate, you're never even gonna graze me.

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
You damn cop...!
Don't get cocky with me!!

name: Jagannath
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">Too slow!!

He swayed to dodge the desperate strike and instantly
unleashed a lightning-fast one-two combination.

name: Ring Announcer
text:
"It's Jagannath's signature 'One-Two Jagan'!
Fast! Too fast! It's as if a shadow itself has leapt on its prey!"

name: Ring Announcer
text:
"He's cornered him against the cage! Like a rabbit before a tiger!
Is this where it all ends—?!"

name: Jagannath
text:
I've got a reason to head home early today.
I'm finishing this right now.

name: Jagannath
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">One... Two... Jagan!!!!

Jagannath's heavy fist slammed the opponent into the cage―
The violent impact echoed throughout the arena.

name: Ring Announcer
text:
"Jagannath roars!! The 'Roar of the Black Tiger' shakes the cage
and makes our very hearts tremble!"

name: Ring Announcer
text:
"And the match is set―! The winner once again
is our very own Black Tiger, Jagannath―!"

options.text: Your engine was really revved up.
You were rougher than usual, it was cool.
Did you have a grudge against that guy...?

name: Jagannath
text:
Hm...?
Oh... about that.

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
Hey, was that kid from the stands your famous junior?
Nice, nice! Introduce me to them later!

name: Jagannath
text:
...Hah?
I told you already, that's my Buddy.

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
But that's only at the station, right...?
C'mon, if I win next time, you have to introduce us... Alright?

name: Jagannath
text:
(...Well, I don't need to tell them that. It'd be too childish to admit
I was 'revved up' just because of that.)

name: Jagannath
text:
I told you, I was just fired up because you were here?
I'm gonna go change, so wait for me. Let's go grab something to eat.

name: Jagannath
text:
I made a killing on the fight money, so I'm treating you.
Think about what you want to eat, alright?

Jagannath waved his hand,
and disappeared into the showers.

options.text: I wonder where we should go eat~
(Reach for the towel he left behind)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, right.
[Player], if you're free—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha...?
You must be quite the bad brat to be trying to steal a police officer's property?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: Maybe I need to give you a bit of 'punishment' before we head out for food?

text:
...The next day.
Also at Kiou Police Academy.

name: Police Academy Student
text:
[Player], have you seen Jagannath-kun?
I haven't seen him since a little while ago...

name: Police Academy Student
text:
I needed to consult him about tonight's 'festival'.
Did he already leave to prepare...?

options.text: I'm sorry, I'll go look for him...

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
Hm... Jagannath? He's not here today,
and he doesn't have a match scheduled.

name: Wrestler Hell Father
text:
More importantly, hey... Could you give me your contact...?
I'd love to have you as my— I mean, 'second'.

options.text: I looked almost everywhere he usually goes...
Where the hell did you goooooo!?

text:
[Player] checked his regular spots, underpasses where
punks hang out, but he was nowhere to be found.

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh? [Player], I was looking for you?
Did you finally learn how to take a breather?

name: Jagannath
text:
Hahaha, for a second, I thought
I was being stood up for our festival date.

options.text: I'm the one who was looking for you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm? Oh, did we just miss each other?
There was a place I just had to stop by.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just so you know, I wasn't doing a solo investigation.
I told you I'd take you with me if I do.

options.text: Why is your phone always off!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm... ah, sorry, I didn't notice.
Fine, fine, I'll make sure to carry my radio next time.

options.text: I was being hit on by Hell Father.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, did he do anything to you?!
Dammit, I knew that guy was eyeing you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I'm definitely gonna crush him in our next match.
I'll make him regret ever thinking of touching you.

name: Jagannath
text:
...What was I doing? That's a secret. Even buddies
can have a secret or two from each other, right?

name: Jagannath
text:
You'll find out once the festival starts.
Hehe, do look forward to it?

Jagannath and [Player] arrived at the otherworldly temple,
where the winter festival had taken place during Christmas.

Though this area would only normally be open at the very end of the year,
but after a recent incident, a special festival was being held.

One reason was the public outcry that a festival so exciting
only happened once a year. But, there was a second reason—

name: Jagannath
text:
Oraaa! Wasshoi! Wasshoi!
You guys aren't loud enough! Show 'em the spirit of the police!

Lining the path to the temple were members of the police force,
hauling floats and shouting at the top of their lungs. That was the second reason.

It seems they decided to form teams to train in earnest, preparing themselves
for the next time they have to clash head-on with the city's hot-headed factions.

Since they were all hot-blooded to begin with,
they were full of energy and spirit.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Perhaps hearing the voice, Jagannath glanced over for a second and flashed a mischievous grin.
It was a habit Jagannath always showed when he was cheered for from the crowd at the fight club.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Police Academy Student
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, I'm quite jealous of you, Jagannath-kun.
Having someone cheer so wholeheartedly for you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A great Buddy, right?
Honestly, having someone to support you makes all the difference.
The heat from Jagannath pulling the float reached [Player] from right behind them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's a good feeling, having allies to support you.
I feel like I can put out ten times the power.
Lifting the heavy float and shouting out, Jagannath's body was completely pumped up.

His sweat made his fur glisten and his muscles shine.
Noticing the gaze, he gave a sharp grin.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Police Academy Student
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu, what an intense gaze, Jagannath-kun.
I'm jealous of how well you get along with your Buddy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A cute kid, aren't they?
Just having them here gets me pumped and lets me put out way more power.

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright, let's keep this momentum! We're gonna take
the lead in this float race at this rate!!

With Jagannath leading them, the police officers
successfully crossed the finish line in first place.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, with a festival lover like me at the helm,
that's about to be expected. So, [Player], was I cool or what?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, right?
As your senior and as your Buddy, I've gotta at least do that much?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Since you're such a cute junior, I'll treat you today.
What do you want to eat?
Or should we try the shooting gallery?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...God, can't you be more honest?
And here your senior was planning to treat you to everything today?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're pretty easy to read, you know?
Your face and gestures were screaming 'Senpai is so cool, I can't take it!!'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, well, let's fill our stomachs first.
Lifting that thing and shouting made me starving.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...God, can't you be more honest?
And here your senior was planning to treat you to everything today?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're pretty easy to read, you know?
Your face and gestures were screaming 'Senpai is so cool, I can't take it!!'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, well, let's fill our stomachs first.
Lifting that thing and shouting made me starving.

text:
[Player] walked around the stalls with Jagannath.
Before they knew it, his hands were soon filled with all sorts of food packs.

name: Jagannath
text:
Haffu, haffu, 'his okon-omiyak-hee's uite ood...
...*gulp* Here, you try some too.

name: Jagannath
text:
Maybe it's because my homeland had a lot of flour-based dishes,
but I love this stuff. The guy who invented this sauce is a genius.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right? Good, isn't it?
Eat up and get strong, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: I've still gotta train you a lot more before I can trust you with my back.

options.text: You've got sauce on your mouth.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm...? Heheh, thanks.
Since you're my Buddy, you can just lick it off if you want?
He laughed like a child as [Player] wiped his mouth, while he stuffed himself with yakisoba.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A body is an investment.
You've gotta eat well if you want to get strong, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: I've still gotta train you a lot more before I can trust you with my back.

name: Jagannath
text:
Now then, while we're filling our stomachs,
there's actually one place I want to go.

name: Jagannath
text:
It actually won't take that long.
Won't you come with me for a bit...
Hey, look at that!

name: Jagannath
text:
That warabimochi looks amazing!
Here, hold this! I'm gonna go buy some!

options.text: ...So, where's the place you want to go?
You really eat a lot... Honestly.

name: Jagannath
text:
Look, we're here.
It's this stall right here—

It was a stall without a shopkeeper.
Just then, Jagannath made his way inside.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, welcome~!
Glad you could make it to Jagannath's Colorful Stall!

name: Jagannath
text:
Surprised? I actually applied for a stall permit.
And, this is my product!

Jagannath lined up bags of colored
powder and spray cans on the counter.

name: Jagannath
text:
These kinds of stalls were common in my homeland.
You use the powder to decorate the customers.

name: Jagannath
text:
Normally, you just hurl the powder at people, but I figured
that’d be a bit much for Tokyo, so I tweaked the style a bit.

name: Jagannath
text:
Here, take a seat. You're my first customer.
It's fine, it washes off easily, and I won't make it too flashy.

options.text: (Let him apply makeup to your face)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Here, close your eyes.
This won't take too long.

A gentle, caressing sensation touched [Player]'s face.
True to Jagannath's word, it was over in an instant.

options.text: (Let him add color to your hair)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, wait right there, my dear customer.
I'm gonna make you the most stylish person at the festival.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Here, close your eyes.
This won't take too long.

A gentle, caressing sensation touched [Player]'s face.
True to Jagannath's word, it was over in an instant.

name: Jagannath
text:
See, now you have my colors.
Happy to match me, aren't you?

name: Jagannath
text:
It's your turn now. Fix up my makeup for me.
I won't complain about the quality.

name: Jagannath
text:
You can make it look like a wrestler's paint,
or even just a small point on my body.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, just give it a shot.
Try whatever you want, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not bad, that's your favorite color, right?
Being dyed in your colors doesn't feel half-bad.

options.text: (Make him close his eyes and touch his face freely)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whu' er yu doin...
You're just playing around now, aren't you?
Remember this, I'm gonna get you back later.

options.text: (Make him close his eyes and press your lips to his)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Oops, I can see right through your schemes.
That's a treat for after the festival, you little delinquent.

name: Jagannath
text:
Also... This is for you. I couldn't give you a present
back then because so much was going on.

name: Jagannath
text:
Consider it a late Christmas
present from your Jagannath-Santa.

Jagannath handed over a small,
palm-sized gift box.

Upon being asked to open it,
[Player] found a silver dog tag inside.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't mention it.
You― chose me as your Buddy, so this is my thanks for that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It matches the one I've got.
Keep it with you as a lucky charm.

options.text: Wait, this must be really expensive.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...God, a rookie like you doesn't have to worry about that.
This is to celebrate us being buddies.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It matches the one I've got.
Keep it with you as a lucky charm.

options.text: There's something written on the back...

dialogue_after_selection.text: Engraved there were the words: 'I love you, Buddy'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Well? Say something.
It's a message of love from your Buddy.

note:
[This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]
all options differ visually

options.text: (Clasp your hands behind your back and kiss him)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...If you'll be my other half, then I'll be your hands.

options.text: (Ask him to hold you in both arms)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Dummy, how am I supposed to fight if my hands are full, [Player]?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, I'm really grateful to you. No one else
ever wanted to be my Buddy.

name: Jagannath
text:
I've always had a thought. What if I had more hands
like that legendary Asura King?

name: Jagannath
text:
If I'm reaching out to one person, I could reach out
to someone else with another hand, right?

name: Jagannath
text:
So, I'm counting on you from now on, 'Buddy'.
I'm gonna be strict with you, got it?

options.text: Let's aim to be the best buddies.

text:
Jagannath raised his fists,
and [Player] raised theirs back in return.

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright! Then let's head out with our matching makeup
and show everyone what a close pair of buddies we are!

name: Jagannath
text:
There are plenty of cops who want to steal you away,
so I've gotta make sure they know you're mine!

Saying so, Jagannath pulled [Player]
close and flashed a wicked grin.

To any onlooker, they look like a pair of inseparable troublemakers.
The Switch-Puncher of Light and Shadow carried his new partner on his shoulders.

With his Buddy's help, Jagannath would surely be
able to switch stances more freely than ever before.

And thus, the legend of
these two buddies began—
